text: Gene Saks (Jean Michael Saks; November 8, 1921 - March 28, 2015) was an American stage and movie director. He is known for his movies Barefoot in the Park, The Odd Couple, and Cactus Flower. Saks was born in New York City on November 6, 1921."Gene Saks Biography" FilmReference.com, accessed August 23, 2011 He studied at Cornell University and at The New School. Saks was married to Bea Arthur from 1950 to 1980. They had two children. He married to Keren Saks. They have one child. Saks died from pneumonia in his East Hampton, New York home on March 28, 2015, aged 93. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Gene Saks at the University of Wisconsin's Actors Studio audio collection Category:Tony Award winners Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from New York City Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from pneumonia Category:Infectious disease deaths in New York (state) Category:Movie directors from New York City
title: Gene Saks
